name: Debug Defuser
description:
Debug Defuser is a fast-paced action and puzzle game where you have to go through rooms and talk to people for parts of the code. The enemies won't like you doing that, so be careful. Oh, and you might just want to have some kind of notepad on you...just saying.

Note: If playing on WebGL, turn on fullscreen because the resolution is kinda...weird. Download is recommended.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Move / Navigate
  • Z: Select / Confirm
  • X: Back
  • Esc: Pause

Credits:

  • Programming by Nughm3 and AdminTroller
  • Music by AdminTroller
  • Sprites by mi_gusta
